title: A Fair cop
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Seon Film Productions, Steven Salgo, John Cruthers and Craig Kirchner
brief_description: A film, for young people to see, that emphasises road safety for cyclists. The film is a fictional dramatisation of a policeman on patrol who encounters some careless riders.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Victoria, Seon Film Productions, Steven Salgo, John Cruthers and Craig Kirchner
